settings.text:
At ChefPrep, one of our constant goals is to focus on the needs of our customers. With this in mind, we’re excited to continue with our Feedback Program.

This program encompasses the entire customer experience at ChefPrep. From using the website to receiving your box or dealing with our Customer Support Team - we want to hear about it all! We know your time is precious, which is why we're happy to reward you for your feedback.

For every 30-minute interview, you'll receive a $50 ChefPrep gift card.

Every month, four people who have completed a survey will be chosen at random to win up to $200 worth of prizes. If you complete more than one survey per month, you'll be entered into the raffle more than once.

We can't wait to hear from you!

To find out more, please enter your details on this form, and we will be in touch

ChefPrep was born out of our frustration with food delivery services. We were not impressed with the taste, quality or convenience of meal kits or “finish at home” delivery services or mass manufactured ready-made meals. We are committed to giving customers access to premium restaurant made meals in the comfort of their own home or office - it’s the ChefPrep difference! ❤️
